Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: These days the housing market is like a wild EDM party - prices are soaring high and everyone is scrambling to figure out what to do. People are concerned as they face this fiscal time bomb that hangs over the country's rail and road projects. It's not just the government even former governments have a hand in this seemingly never-ending ordeal. As if reading the crowd our expert economist weighs in on the Reserve Bank board meeting and begs the question - will this week in finance give Aussies a reason to keep dancing or are we about to drop the beat?
